contact.title: Contact me
contact.text: If you'd like to get in touch, you can send me an email directly at snaerth@gmail.com or message me on Facebook

rows.title: Dohop
rows.content: In Dohop I have worked on a variety of projects. My job is a combination of production owner, technology leader and programming. The tools I have worked with most in Dohop are Node.js, React.js, Less, css modules, Python in the backend, Less,  CSS modules and Amazon AWS.

rows.title: Advania
rows.content: At Advania I have worked on many various projects as a web developer for the past 3 years. I have good experience in both front- and backend development. I have programmed large websites and web services both REST and SOAP. My main strength lies in Javascript and CSS, more specifically in Node.js, React with Redux, SASS, LESS and CSS Modules.

rows.title: Seljaskóli
rows.content: Middle school teacher in Seljaskóli. I also taught optional subjects such as physical education, Icelandic wrestling, football and general sports.

rows.title: Ungmennafélagið Valur
rows.content: Summer course supervisor for children´s Youth Program Valur in Reyðarfjörður.

rows.title: Ármann
rows.content: Icelandic Glima wrestling coach at Ármann Sports Club. I trained children and teenagers as well as adult champion courses.

rows.title: Japan
rows.content: Obtained the black belt and practised Judo in Matsuyama, Japan for five months as well as teaching primary and secondary students English.

rows.title: University of Iceland
rows.content: Bachelor of Education in Elementary Education, B.Ed. - Major in mathematics

images.text: Reunion with my Judo master Mr. Bunji sensei in Matsuyama, Japan
Good cup of Vietnamese Weasel coffee Hanoi, Vietnam

about.title: about me
about.text: My name is Snær Seljan Þóroddsson. I was born in 1983 and I grew up in Reyðarfjörður in the east of Iceland. I have lived in the capital Reykjavik since 2004. I am a father, programmer, teacher, Icelandic Glima wrestler and Judo man. Activities of interest include family, programming of course, environmental issues, veganisim, health and training, films, outdoor activities and recently yoga. In my spare time I love spending time with my family or hacking in some programming language.

images.text: Me and Embla chilling by the lake
Fushimi Inari Tori Gates in Kyoto, Japan

projects.text: Programmed and designed Icelandic Glíma website
projects.title: glima.is (2019)

projects.text: Everything you want to know about movies both in screening and upcoming in Icelandic cinemas.
projects.title: biomynd.is (2015)
projects.titleText: All movies in cinemas in one place.

projects.text: Icelandic movie API is a free REST service for movies showing in Icelandic cinemas.
projects.title: api.kvikmyndir.is (2016)
projects.titleText: Free REST service for movies in Icelandic cinemas.

projects.title: Work projects
projects.text: The main tasks I've worked on are related to frontend programming, but I have also worked on many projects in backend programming. My strength lies in the frontend, especially in Javascript frameworks like React.js, Vue.js, Next.js or Gatsby.js. I am also really good in plain vanilla Javascript. I work well with others and in teams. Please contact snaerth@gmail.com for further information.
